title: Wake Up Dead Man: A Knives Out Mystery
overview: When young priest Jud Duplenticy is sent to assist charismatic firebrand Monsignor Jefferson Wicks, itâ€™s clear that all is not well in the pews. After a sudden and seemingly impossible murder rocks the town, the lack of an obvious suspect prompts local police chief Geraldine Scott to join forces with renowned detective Benoit Blanc to unravel a mystery that defies all logic.
